HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.Name: UpdateFeatureBase
HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.modNameReadable: Mechalit Core v2 Patch for Outposts Mines

HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Added N-16 as a mineable resource from Outposts
Fixed some xml issues. N-16 was removed due to how the Outposts calculates values based off mineable ore.
